org.spongepowered.api.text.format

Class TextStyle.Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.format.TextStyle
      • org.spongepowered.api.text.format.TextStyle.Base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CatalogType, TextElement
    Enclosing class:
    TextStyle

    public abstract static class TextStyle.Base
extends TextStyle
implements CatalogType
    Represents a TextStyle that is not a composite, for example TextStyles.BOLD. It is a base text style in Minecraft with a name.
    See Also:
    TextStyle, TextStyle.Base
